name: Trigeminovascular Dysautonomia
chief_complaint: I have excruciating facial pain that comes in waves, like electric shocks, and my left eye keeps tearing up uncontrollably

lab_results.3T MRI: neurovascular conflict at root entry zone

prognosis: Guarded - 60% achieve significant pain reduction with combined surgical/medical approach, but may require multiple interventions
description: A rare neurovascular disorder involving pathological interactions between trigeminal nerve fibers and cerebral vasculature, causing severe paroxysmal pain with prominent autonomic features. Distinct from classical trigeminal neuralgia by its autonomic component and more diffuse pain pattern.
